message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present this exceptional product to you. It's truly a remarkable item with numerous features and benefits that could significantly enhance your life or business. Given its unique value, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $8000 to the right person. Considering its quality and potential impact, I'm offering you the opportunity to acquire it for $12000. This is an exclusive chance to secure such a valuable asset at a premium rate. I trust you'll find the investment worthwhile. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product.
